page.title: 05EDUCATION-NATIONAL SCHOOL
page.content: The National school was opened AD 1832.It's by the main road to LLanfyllin and LLansantffraid.It had got two class rooms and a cloak room.Itis stone built.It closed down in 1951.The stove used to smoke.It would be cold for the children, because the teacher would be by it all the while.In 1928 they had bucket toilets which were modern in those days.Dr Evans from the Mount was Father Christmas giving out presents.His beard caught fire.He had severe burns to his face and hands.This happened in 1930.
